Detailed Description

Utility class to persist a path.

Class PathProfile provides a means to persist a pathname in a format which can easily be stored and loaded e.g. to some file. In order to load and store a path, please see the following sample function:

    static BOOLEAN StoreAndLoadPath()
    {
        Path path(Pathname("/file.txt"), L"ffs");
        PathProfile path_profile;

        // Persist the path to the path profile.
        path.WriteTo(path_profile);

        // Write the path profile to some file.
        const UINT num_of_bytes = sizeof(PathProfile);
        const void *write_buf = &path_profile;

        // Write write_buf with size num_of_bytes to some file...

        // ...

        // Read the path profile from some file.
        void *read_buf = &path_profile;

        // Read the path profile into read_buf with size num_of_bytes from some
        // file...

        // Restore the path declaration from path_profile.
        path.ReadFrom(path_profile);
    }
